verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he had <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G4973>seal<s%>, there <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G4602>silence<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> about the space <S%G5613>of<s%> half an <S%G2256>hour<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G3031>censer<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2368>incense<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G1325>offer<s%> it with the <S%G4335>prayers<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G2586>smoke<s%> of the <S%G2368>incense<s%>, which came with the <S%G4335>prayers<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%>, ascended <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G32>angel's<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G3031>censer<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1072>filled<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G1537>with<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> of the <S%G2379>altar<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> it <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1027>thunderings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G796>lightnings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G4578>earthquake<s%>.

<S%G2532><s%>The <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>followed<s%> <S%G5464>hail<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G3396>mingled<s%> with <S%G129>blood<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of <S%G1186>trees<s%> was burnt <S%G2618>up<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5515>green<s%> <S%G5528>grass<s%> was burnt <S%G2618>up<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> with <S%G4442>fire<s%> was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of the <S%G2938>creatures<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>, and <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%>, <S%G599>died<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of the <S%G4143>ships<s%> were <S%G1311>destroyed<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G4098>fell<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G792>star<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G2545>burning<s%> as it <S%G5613>were<s%> a <S%G2985>lamp<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of the <S%G4215>rivers<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> the <S%G4077>fountains<s%> of <S%G5204>waters<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G792>star<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G894>Wormwood<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of the <S%G5204>waters<s%> <S%G1096%G1519>became<s%> <S%G894>wormwood<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5204>waters<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> they were made <S%G4087>bitter<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of the <S%G2246>sun<s%> was <S%G4141>smitten<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of the <S%G4582>moon<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of the <S%G792>stars<s%>; so <S%G2443>as<s%> the third <S%G5154>part<s%> of <S%G846>them<s%> was <S%G4654>darkened<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G5316>shone<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> for a third <S%G5154>part<s%> of <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I <S%G1492>beheld<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1520>an<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4072>flying<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the midst of <S%G3321>heaven<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, <S%G3759>Woe<s%>, <S%G3759>woe<s%>, <S%G3759>woe<s%>, to the <S%G2730>inhabiters<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> by reason <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> of the <S%G4536>trumpet<s%> of the <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G3195>yet<s%> to <S%G4537>sound<s%>!
